description: Pair of Three-panel Screens (paravents); Probably after cartoons by Jean-Baptiste Belin de Fontenay (French, 1653 - 1715), and Alexandre-François Desportes (French, 1661 - 1743), Savonnerie Manufactory (French, active 1627 - present); 1714 to 1740; Wool and linen; cotton twill gimp; wooden interior frame; modern velvet lining; 83.DD.260; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
